title: Building A Strong, Creative Work Ethic with Max Moore
description: On this week's episode, Max Moore of Louisville, Kentucky joins us in the studio to break down what it takes to create the best music videos and commercials. Max started in college reaching out to bands and pitching his vision to direct, shoot, and edit videos. Now, Max is considered one of the elite directors and editors in the video world. Listen to Max's journey from going on tour as a musician in high school to now directing and creating films with some of the biggest musicians and brands.
